action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Write your plan for your next actions on the line below your action, starting with "Next actions:".
For example:
> open cupboard
Next actions: take orange, eat orange

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the pillow on the table, the book on the table and the plate on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a side table, a chair, a shelf and a book. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen, a hallway and a bedroom here.

> go to kitchen
Next actions: pick up pillow, pick up plate
Turn 1
You are in a kitchen now. There are a table, a plate, a counter and a cupboard. The plate is on the counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a living room, a pantry and a hallway here.

> pick up plate
Next actions: go to living room, put plate on table
Turn 2
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.

> go to living room
Next actions: put plate on table, pick up book
Turn 3
You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a side table, a chair, a shelf and a book. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen, a hallway and a bedroom here.

> pick up book
Next actions: put book on table, go to kitchen, pick up pillow
Turn 4
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book and a plate.

> put book on table
Next actions: go to kitchen, pick up pillow
Turn 5
You can't see a table here.

> go to living room
Next actions: put book on table, go to kitchen, pick up pillow
Turn 6
You are already in the living room.

> put book on table
Next actions: go to kitchen, pick up pillow
Turn 7
You can't see a table here.

> go to kitchen
Next actions: pick up pillow
Turn 8
You are in a kitchen now. There are a table, a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a living room, a pantry and a hallway here.

> pick up pillow
Next actions: go to living room, put pillow on table

> go to bedroom
Next actions: pick up pillow

> go to hallway
Next actions: go to bedroom, pick up pillow
Turn 11
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a broom closet, a living room and a kitchen here.

> go to bedroom
Next actions: pick up pillow
Turn 12
You can't go to a bedroom from here.

> go to living room
Next actions: go to bedroom, pick up pillow

You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a side table, a chair and a shelf. There are passages to a kitchen, a hallway and a bedroom here.

> go to bedroom
Next actions: pick up pillow
Turn 14
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe, a pillow and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. The pillow is on the bed. There is a passage to a living room here.

> pick up pillow
Next actions: go to living room, put pillow on table
Turn 15
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.

> go to living room
Next actions: put plate on table, go to bedroom, pick up pillow

Next actions: put plate on table, go to bedroom, pick up pillow
Turn 18
You are in a kitchen now. There are a table, a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a living room, a pantry and a hallway here.

Next actions: go to bedroom, pick up pillow
Turn 19

> go to bedroom
Next actions: pick up pillow
Turn 20

Turn 23

> go to living room

Turn 24

> put pillow on table
Next actions: done
Turn 25

> go to kitchen
Next actions: put pillow on table, done
Turn 26
You are in a kitchen now. There are a table, a plate, a counter and a cupboard. The plate is on the table. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a living room, a pantry and a hallway here.

> put pillow on table
Next actions: done
Turn 27
You put the pillow on the table.
